amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing mortgage lending to rural areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 339 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 339 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Rounds. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2016) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing mortgage lending to rural areas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 339 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 339 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Rounds.
